meanings.definition: A type of fungal spore that is formed by the fragmentation of a hypha into separate cells.
meanings.sent1: The arthrospore helps the fungus spread to new areas.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the arthrospore to understand fungal reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The arthrospore decided to throw a party and invite all its fungal friends.
meanings.sent4: The arthrospore, like tiny puzzle pieces, scattered to create new life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the arthrospore looked like a tiny cluster of cells ready to grow.

meanings.definition: To reproduce asexually by forming arthrospores.
meanings.sent1: Fungi can arthrospore to quickly increase their numbers.
meanings.sent2: The fungus will arthrospore when conditions are favorable for growth.
meanings.sent3: The fungi decided to arthrospore instead of waiting for a partner.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, the scientist watched the fungus arthrospore under controlled conditions.
meanings.sent5: The ability to arthrospore allows fungi to adapt and thrive in various environments.
